DELETE FROM arr_cached_node WHERE node_id IN (SELECT distinct node_id FROM arr_desc_item di JOIN arr_item i ON i.item_id = di.item_id JOIN arr_data_unitdate du ON du.data_id = i.data_id WHERE du.format LIKE '%C' AND du.value_to NOT SIMILAR TO '\d\d00-12-31%' AND value_to NOT LIKE '-%')
UPDATE arr_data_unitdate SET value_from = SUBSTRING(value_from, 1, 2) || '01-01-01T00:00:00' WHERE format LIKE 'C%' AND value_from NOT SIMILAR TO '\d\d01-01-01%' AND value_from NOT LIKE '-%'
UPDATE arr_data_unitdate SET value_to = SUBSTRING(value_to, 1, 2) || '00-12-31T23:59:59' WHERE format LIKE '%C' AND value_to NOT SIMILAR TO '\d\d00-12-31%' AND value_to NOT LIKE '-%'

UPDATE ap_state s SET delete_change_id = bs.create_change_id FROM ap_binding_state bs WHERE bs.access_point_id = s.access_point_id AND bs.delete_change_id IS NULL AND s.delete_change_id IS NULL AND s.replaced_by IS NOT NULL

DELETE FROM ap_cached_access_point WHERE access_point_id IN ( SELECT s.access_point_id FROM ap_state s JOIN (SELECT access_point_id, MAX(create_change_id) AS create_change_id FROM ap_state s GROUP BY access_point_id) src ON s.access_point_id = src.access_point_id AND s.create_change_id = src.create_change_id AND s.delete_change_id IS NOT NULL JOIN ap_part ap ON ap.access_point_id = s.access_point_id WHERE ap.key_value_id IS NOT NULL)

UPDATE ap_part SET key_value_id = null WHERE part_id IN ( SELECT ap.part_id FROM ap_state s JOIN (select access_point_id, max(create_change_id) as create_change_id from ap_state s group by access_point_id) src on s.access_point_id = src.access_point_id and s.create_change_id = src.create_change_id and s.delete_change_id is not null JOIN ap_part ap ON ap.access_point_id = s.access_point_id WHERE ap.key_value_id IS NOT NULL)
